dct_title_s:
Carte des Costes de L'Afrique depuis Cap de Lopo Iuſques à l'Isle Mazira
          levée par Ordre Expres des Roys de Portugal sous qui on en a Fait la
          Decouverte
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the coast of Africa from Cape Lopo to the island of Mazira
dct_description_sm:
Includes portion of Arabia. Inset: Fortresse de Mozambique. Sea contain two compass
        roses with rhumb lines.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
